name: CheckboxView
description: A checkbox component with square and circle shapes, optional label text, and enabled/disabled states. Supports brand-aware theming via CheckboxColorScheme.

properties.name: checkboxText
properties.description: The label text displayed next to the checkbox

properties.name: checkboxShape
properties.description: Shape of the checkbox indicator: SQUARE or CIRCLE

properties.name: checkboxShowText
properties.description: Whether to show the label text

properties.name: onCheckedChange
properties.description: Callback fired when checked state changes

xmlUsage:
<com.example.components.checkbox.CheckboxView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:checkboxShape="square"
    app:checkboxChecked="false"
    app:checkboxEnabled="true"
    app:checkboxShowText="true"
    app:checkboxText="Label"/>
kotlinUsage:
val checkbox = CheckboxView(context)
checkbox.configure(
    text = "Label",
    shape = CheckboxView.Shape.SQUARE,
    isChecked = false,
    isEnabled = true,
    showText = true,
    colorScheme = brand.checkboxColorScheme(isDark)
)
checkbox.onCheckedChange = { checked -> /* handle change */ }
